## Get external data from HAL
```{r}
#| label: data_import
#| eval: false
start <- Sys.time()
quarto::quarto_render("_external.qmd", quiet = TRUE)
targets::tar_make(script = "_external.R", store = "_external")
Sys.time()-start
```
